title: McDonaldâ€™s (North & East) goes premium, to bring in Signature Collection
description: McDonald's India has launched its global Signature Collection of premium burgers in North and East India. These gourmet burgers start at Rs 225, while entry-level burgers remain at Rs 58. The initiative aims to meet growing consumer demand for premium products amid rising competition from other brands.
